2.0.0-alpha.name: loops/gdimage
2.0.0-alpha.description: Import, transform, export images helping GD. This librairy provide: GIF support, JPEG support, PNG24 support, PNG8 support, HTTP support, data URI support, palette color enhancement (especially on GD transparent color leaks), resizing (crop, full, filled), color filtering (grayscale, sepia, custom), basic convolution (blur, sharpen, invert, custom), advanced convolution (border crop, border wrap, alpha calculate)… I will not detail all the abilities. Coming soon: AGIF and APNG support (the library has been designed for that purpose).
